edge_1: treating physician relationship, Carlisle provides medical care to Bella during her pregnancy and delivery
edge_2: mother-daughter relationship, Bella gives birth to Renesmee
edge_3: Renesmee is a half-vampire, resulting from the union between Bella and Edward

edge_3: A distraught Jacob decides to kill Renesmee for apparently causing Bella's death; however, when he looks into the baby's eyes, he 'imprints' on her: a werewolf phenomenon in which one realizes one's soul-mate.
